GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.19.6
GSD.description:
net: Fix data-races around weight_p and dev_weight_[rt]x_bias.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.6 by commit 01198bebd53e21a139f7d8eacd190f262fbd66eb, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit 3d48b53fb2ae37158e700ffef3f45461ff15c965. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: Fix data-races around weight_p and dev_weight_[rt]x_bias.
